alert.note: Alert for Baker; Miller; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 12:12PM EDT until March 25 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1211 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Colquitt, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pelham, Camilla, Babcock, Hopeful, Mitchell Co A/P, Hoggard Mill, Branchville, Cotton, Cooktown and Bellview. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
